title: Luka Merdović
text:
Luka Merdović (<a href="Cyrillic">Cyrillic</a>: Лукa Mepдoвић, born 14 March 1989) is a <a href="Montenegrins%20%28ethnic%20group%29">Montenegrin</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> forward who plays for <a href="OFK%20Petrovac">OFK Petrovac</a>.
Club career.
He had played with Montenegrin clubs <a href="FK%20Budu%C4%87nost%20Podgorica">FK Budućnost Podgorica</a>, <a href="FK%20Mornar">FK Mornar</a>, <a href="FK%20Mladost%20Podgorica">FK Mladost Podgorica</a> and <a href="FK%20Sutjeska%20Nik%C5%A1i%C4%87">FK Sutjeska Nikšić</a> before moving to <a href="OFK%20Beograd">OFK Beograd</a> where he played the first half of the 2010-11 <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a> season. During the winter break he returned to Mladost to play in the <a href="Montenegrin%20First%20League">Montenegrin First League</a>.
In 2017 he played for Greek side <a href="Agrotikos%20Asteras%20F.C.">Agrotikos Asteras</a>.
